measure.title: Entering Czech Republic with symptoms of infectious disease
measure.meta_description: Contact a general practitioner and undergo a health check at the border.

content.processed:
It has been decreed that all persons who entered the territory of the Czech Republic after 18th December 2020, 00:00 hours,

and who are exhibiting any signs of a starting infectious disease (including but not limited to an increased temperature, cough, shortness of breath, digestive problems, loss of the sense of smell, overall weakness and possibly other symptoms) shall immediately report this fact over the telephone or by another means of remote access to their registering provider of medical services in the field of general medical care or general medical care for children and adolescents or, if they do not have a registering provider, to any provider of general medical care or general medical care for children and adolescents,

shall submit themselves, when crossing the state border, to a medical examination in order to be checked for symptoms of an infectious disease, and if symptoms of an infectious disease are identified, they shall provide medical staff with the cooperation necessary for taking of a biological sample for the purpose of testing for the presence of COVID-19;

Full text of the measure.
